{'created_at': '2025-11-25T04:53:04.776145Z', 'steps': [{'step_number': 1, 'description': 'Wash rice, moong dal and toor dal thoroughly. {'created_at': '2025-08-19T04:53:05.648754Z', 'steps': [{'step_number': 1, 'description': 'Soak cashews in warm water for 15 minutes and grind to a smooth paste with a tablespoon of water.'}, {'step_number': 2, 'description': 'Heat butter and oil in a heavy-bottom pan on medium flame.
